articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: Edd Straw's 2024 F1 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix driver rankings - The Race
articles.description: The Saudi Arabian GP may have been another straightforward Red Bull 1-2 at the start of the 2024 F1 season, but ranking the drivers was a task that involved a couple of curveballs. Here's Edd Straw's final verdict
articles.content:
